content: yarn tail insert the needle into stitch and out under the next stitch the closed piece at a point under the current stitch and out of the other side of the piece 7 if you have extra yarn tail insert 8 cut the yarn tail as close to your the needle back into the point where piece as possible if the yarn tail is it came out and out of a different still visible just massage your piece point on the other side of the piece until it disappears tug on the yarn just enough so that it can t be seen from the outside repeat this entire step as many times as you like i like to do it twice thewoobles com © 2019 the woobles all rights reserved
